means: 锯木匠，漂流水中的树木，显赫天牛（其幼虫钻木为穴）
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 索耶职业名称，锯木工，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“锯”(to saw)

sentence.Network_en: Mr. Sawyer goes to work and the children go to school.

sentence.Network_en: 'But you are not English,'said the wood - sawyer,'though you wear English dress?'

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (earlier as sawer): from the noun saw + -yer

means.word_mean: 1. one who is employed to saw wood
2. any of several beetles whose larvae bore holes in dead or dying trees especially conifers
